thread.title: Stephanie
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Stephanie

author: Stephanie
title: Stephanie
text: My experience was extremely pleasant. Jeff was very helpful. Wasn't pushy, explained everything to me throughly. Set me up with delivery quickly. Two days later when I came back in to buy, I brought my sister and she actually purchased something as well. Overall great service and great deals.
